title: Talk about depression - get chat restricted
body:
I'm having a really tough time at the moment, my dad is currently in hospital really sick so I've been battling with depression. Being chat restricted has been a real issue as I can't talk and socialise with other players, it's literally because Riot has a vendetta against me and I must be on their watch list or something (they just made me change my name too). 

Been playing fine, ACTIVELY praising other players. Get restricted again...ok...must be some residual reports or something. Play them out....CONTINUING TO BE POSITIVE AND PRAISING AS RIOT SUGGESTED. Now I have another 25 game restriction after telling people that they shouldn't be rude in post game chat as I'm battling depression. 

RIOT, EXPLAIN

replies.body: Actually 90% of the community is great to talk with and fun to banter with. Makes it not feel like I'm playing against robots

From reading your other comments, I can tell you were banned not for talking about real life problems, most likely for raging, and one of those types that say "Go ahead and report, I have been reported X times before"

And the punishments do stack, a lot higher than you can on {{item:3041}}.  25 is nothing, on EUW the starting mark is 100, and you get it for saying "Easy". (Proof here : http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=722772&page=1#post7531869)

Shouldn't have been nasty to your team to start with. Good on Riot for the ban.

Last thing, real life problems, don't bring it to games. Other players are not your personal punching bags or psychiatrists.

I never ask to be reported, I hate being chat restricted as I've clearly pointed out. It's literally been a case of what I've said in my other comments, telling people they shouldn't be so rude and being called a variety of things in return, as well as being reported. Yes, I've found out the hard way you can be banned for being positive.

And nasty to my team? As I've stated everywhere else, I only abuse those that waste my time. Be it AFKing or trolling, I never actually say anything negative to anyone if they're trying, even if they're negative KDA. We all have bad games, I sure as hell have some. But what I cant stand is people purposely trying to ruin the game

I think you need to leave League of Legends and do something else. If you're really battling with depression, online multiplayer games will not help unless you already have a group of **real** friends to play with.
I guess if you don't talk in game, people tend to report the unexplained. I have seen a guy in other server with a 999 game restriction, which start with 30 that he didn't type a word since then.

what does your dad being in hospital and you being depressed have to do with anything about you and your chat restrictions? it just looks like you're playing the sympathy card. it makes you look sneaky and conniving which is the behaviour of negative/toxic/anti-social people. if its an excuse as to why you have been toxic then its not good enough and nobody cares. that shit shouldnt be brought into the game with your teammates, leave that behind, play properly, and dont fight negativity with toxicity and vice versa

No my dad being in hospital has nothing to do with my prior chat restrictions, I am using LoL and socialising with people as a way to try and take my mind of things. The funny thing is you're probably one of the people I'm talking about. I was just saying to the other team that they shouldn't say horrible things to other players, using my current situation AS AN EXAMPLE, NOT AN EXCUSE. 

What I'm asking is why do I get punished for trying to the right thing. I just got reported for telling the other team that I reported their AFKing as they were requesting I did. Their ADC then reported me, for reporting her. That now means I'm going to have another 25 game chat restriction after I complete the current one. Do you think that's fair?
Why are you telling people you reported them? It doesn't help anything and promotes toxicity.
The whole team asked "please report our adc" and I simply replied "No worries, I will". Followed by you have been reported for blah blah blah.....absolutely stupid

A little uncalled for, but you really should have turned off All Chat a long time ago. It's really only there for trash talking and complaining. Tell me if you ever do make it out of this endless ban.

Uncalled for? their ADC literally sat at base because "the rest of her team were shit". That is what's uncalled for, she deserves to be reported. I wont ever make it out of this endless ban because my account is literally busted. My only choice is to buy a new level 30 account and start ranked from scratch
